methods.name: reset
methods.description: Reset to initial state (not swiped to any side)
methods.description_zh: 重置为初始状态（不滑动到任何一侧）

events.name: left
events.description: Emitted when user finished sliding the item to the left
events.description_zh: 当用户完成向左滑动项目时发出

events.name: right
events.description: Emitted when user finished sliding the item to the right
events.description_zh: 当用户完成向右滑动项目时发出

events.name: top
events.description: Emitted when user finished sliding the item up
events.description_zh: 用户完成向上滑动时发出

events.name: bottom
events.description: Emitted when user finished sliding the item down
events.description_zh: 当用户完成向下滑动项目时发出

events.name: slide
events.description: Emitted while user is sliding the item to one of the available sides
events.description_zh: 当用户将项目滑动到其中一个可用侧时发出

events.name: action
events.description: Emitted when user finished sliding the item to either sides
events.description_zh: 当用户完成将项滑动到任一侧时发出

left-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
left-color.desc: Color name for bottom-side background from the Quasar Color Palette
left-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

right-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
right-color.desc: Color name for bottom-side background from the Quasar Color Palette
right-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

top-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
top-color.desc: Color name for bottom-side background from the Quasar Color Palette
top-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

bottom-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
bottom-color.desc: Color name for bottom-side background from the Quasar Color Palette
bottom-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

slots.name: default
slots.description: This is where item's sections go; Suggestion: QItemSection
slots.description_zh: 这是 item 部分的去处;建议：QItemSection
